title: Chris Rock Lamar Odom Joke - Chris Rock Tweets Insensitive Joke About Lamar and Khloe Kardashian
text:
Chris Rock was just announced as the host of next year's Oscars, and he may have given the Internet a clue of the kind of jokes he'll give on stage. Here's a hint: They'll be controversial.
He tweeted a joke about Lamar Odom, who is giving his marriage to Khloé​ Kardashian another try after a drug overdose left him near death. Rock tweeted the joke, which was created by Someecards, with the caption, "Stay strong Lamar."
 Stay strong Lamar. pic.twitter.com/oWeciBKR9t
— Chris Rock (@chrisrock) October 23, 2015
More From Cosmopolitan Some fans on Twitter were not too happy.
@chrisrock Not sure if I should consider this inappropriate or hail you as a God damn genius
— Jeff Rothman (@amazingjr87) October 23, 2015
@chrisrock shame on you! That's not something you can joke about it!
— waldrof (@iconicmoss) October 23, 2015
@chrisrock Bad timing dude. Let him at least get well enough to leave the hospital before you throw mud at him.
— Dustie Hamrick (@DustieLee) October 23, 2015
It's unlikely he'll apologize — this is Chris Rock we're talking about. With the "Stay strong, Lamar" comment, it was clear he was joking out of love. And since you have to have a healthy sense of humor to marry into the Kardashian family, Odom probably would think it was funny.
